Blog.post: You know I just received an Sms from my auntie all the way in Indonesia and said that my grandma's (from my mom's side) chloestrol and all was really high. I don't know what it's supposed to mean but I really hope she doesn't die. She's so nice... Chloe's coming home tomorrow morning and she's supposed to Sms me but the thing is Dad took my handphone away because HIS handphone broke so he decided to borrow MINE for 5 days. Why couldn't we have a spare hp?? Oh why? yeah... anyway. School is getting weirder and Ms. Stanley is just gettng on my nerves. At least I don't have MR. POSNER. Everyone hates him. Ah well.. hehe I as just lucky enough to be moved to ACCELERATE Science Class.!!! Whee!!!!!! So much more experimets and other fun things... :D Ruben i mizz ya baby... haven't seen you on chat... or anything. Chloe... I have loads of kropok for you... I know muh grl loves it.... Runster I know you want attention... and attention IS what you're getting. You're loved GRL everyone likes you.. I know you can't get LUCAS but eventually he'll notice and LOVE ya like hell. Because I know something you don't know.. ;) As for Archi... get over Kath she loves Tye now... Yaz.. you're cool... but stop crushing on everyone. DON'T i repeat DON'T make any whatsoever communication with Aidan.. A gay ass doesn't deserve a grl like you!! Stella... (copycatter of my SHOES) ah well. You'll meet Ruben eventually. You'll meet the guy I love truly.. eventually AND DON'T EVEN PLAN ON STEALING HIM... ;) JK I noe you're nice grrrl!!! Yay...! As for Louise H. YAY you like PINK!!!! u go grl! Faydee... I have nothing to say to you but um... you look so wacky in that picture!!! HAHA so cute!! ^^'' .\/.. HEHE Well... Oma Netty get well soon!!! Well lower your chlolesterol level... Muh baby Ruben.. I'll meet you soon boi. ~*muah*~ love ya till i die.. MAYBE well for now. LOVE YA AND MIZZ YA ALWAYS. P.s: Oma is grandma in Dutch... ^^'' Phrase of the day::.. She gave him 12 roses, 11 real and 1 fake and said " I'll love you till the last one dies " Aww... how sweet... ;) That goes to you Ruben, baby. LOve ya!!! xoxo muah

i'm so friggin bored.. that's why i reverted to writing in the blog again. Oh my god help me I'm so damn bored. Well there has been this huge rain shower that just cam and lasted like 10 minutes. now it's kinda bright again. The cumulo-nimbus clouds came and took over and thats why there was rain. It was called convectional rain. The sun heats up the ground.. ya dee ya dee yah. cant be bothered to explain. isnt my blog the coolest?? not.... well anyway. now i seriously have nothing to say. im now bad mooded. cos im so bored... ive done everything! from practicing piano to playing on the comp!! bored!!!!!!!!!!!! ok you knoe im ganna calm down now... dont peace out... war out! ..|.. { if u know what it means... try figuring it out with your hand. dots are folded fingers }

OK so I guess this is my new blog... I have an old blog 2! Hehe except i share that with chloe k. im @ hm... bored well @ least i skip skool. My toe is broken thats y. im so sleepy... its like 9 something. i have to practice piano!!! boo hoo. olympix is cool... lol ok anyway if u wanna go to my old blog.. its: http://www.tish-chlo.blogspot.com so yeah. well i think its that anyway my toe hurts like hell!!!!!!!!! ah!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i have english homework wich i finished and yeah. tis morns i had to call angie to inform that i aint comin ta skool. hehe bt mr snowball piked up... :o ah well. i cant move muh friggin toezies. they hurt so much. hai yah. i cant walk. i cant walk. well i hobble wen i walk. i can half walk. pain! i will haf time to deco muh hw diary... yay! ^^'' .\/.. hehe aint that cute?? chloe wil come bak in approx. 5 daes. or 4. yayz!!!!! finally. my dear chloe comes back grands r celebratin their golden wedding on 28th aug. golden is 50 yrs btw. mom said were goin boatin round spore n petite chloe is ganna come...we ganna swim n git bitten by lil animals in d sea!!! lalalala.... yeah we were ganna go to malaysia until BIRD FLU came. now we aint goin dere no more. hai yah stupid birdies.... i meant birds as in the animal birds..... hehe the ones dat fly. yeah bt gramma scred o gettin seasik so maybe we aint goin boating afta all. well i hope so... :'( hmmmm oki doki ya noe im ganna go do sumthin that will pt meh in more pain cos of muh friggin toe. hai yah. im in d hi-est maf class! wow... muh score was 57/71 wich pt meh in d hi-est. also im in accelerate science... so much more funner dan real science. we gt to make volcanoes n blow em up wich made so many blak marks on e ceilin... hehe arek's bro ivan is a cool dude. so good @ bball. well he plays wit niggers in the states. i don mean niggers in a bad way soz.... lalalalalalala...lalalalalalala... lalalalalalalalala..... dididididi...didididididi... dididididi...didididididi hehe happy tree frenz!!!! peace out ^^'' .\/..
